title: Pastor, 3 Other Ministers Among Victims Of Charleston, S.C., Shooting
teaser: Nine people were killed in Wednesday night's shooting at a church in Charleston, S.C. The Rev. Dr. Clementa Pinckney, three other ministers, and other members of the congregation are among the dead.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
